root.name: Wild Earth: African Safari
root.description: Helpful guides, a professor and a nature journalist, bring entertaining and educational dialog that accompanies the player on their safari adventure. Lions, Giraffes, Hippos, Elephants and many other favorite animal icons lend their personality and variety the game. The player may collect lots of optional photo-ops, many of which will appear in the post-mission article, letting the player live out the role of a nature photographer. The game features a cooperative mode, allowing one of the players to control the movement, while the others try to catch photographs. Great for families.
